page.title: 08OLD PEOPLE IN BUCKHURST HILL
page.content: There are 4 old peoples homes in this block.The block is suitable for old people because it is not far from Epping Forest and doctors are helpful. Also there are groups of people willing to visit,such as girl guides and girls from Bancrofts School. We went to vist an old people's home. This had 11 ladies with 16 staff looking after them. Council homes can have up to 60 people staying in them. At the home we went to vist most of the old ladies were from Buckhurst Hill.They would stay at the home for an average of 4-5 years.Most of them are happy living there.Most of the day is spent sat in the lounge. The highlights of the day are mealtimes and the occasional visitor.Only 4 of the ladies ever go out at.Their bigest problem is deafnes and lost memory.
